General.Name: Guangdong Vanward New Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Vanward New Electric Co., Ltd. provides solutions for kitchen and bathroom appliances and hot water heating systems in China and internationally. The company offers gas water heaters, gas boilers, and electric water heaters; heat pumps; electric fireplaces; range hoods, ovens, hobs, and small home appliances; and outdoor gas products. Guangdong Vanward New Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.
